title: Advertising & Provider Info
description: Fixed, clearly disclosed advertising placements on an educational publishing platform.
main_html:
If you only read one thing:

Before contacting any provider, make sure you understand what is being offered, how credentials are verified, and what questions you need answered in writing.

Advertising

Advertising & Provider Info

Fixed, clearly disclosed sponsorship placements on an independent educational publishing platform.

%%AD:for_providers_top%%

This site is designed for modern discovery. We publish structured, high-signal educational content organized for both traditional search and AI-assisted discovery.

We do not sell leads, referral traffic, rankings, or sponsored directory listings. Sponsorships are limited, predictable placements that do not influence editorial content.

References to AI-assisted discovery describe general content architecture and visibility trends. We do not control, operate, or guarantee placement within third-party AI or search platforms.

How sponsorships work

  • All advertising is clearly labeled
  • Editorial content is created independently
  • No rotation, auctions, or performance guarantees
  • Inventory is intentionally limited to preserve trust and visibility

Sponsorship tiers & pricing

Editorial Guide Presence

$990 / month

Submit Inquiry

Shared sponsorship placement within educational guides and FAQs. Designed for providers seeking visibility without exclusivity.

  • Appears across multiple guide and FAQ pages
  • Clearly labeled as advertising
  • Non-exclusive

Category Ownership

$1,500 / month

Submit Inquiry

Exclusive sponsorship of a specific category within a city (for example: a service line or practice area).

  • Top, mid, and bottom placements on category pages
  • One sponsor per category
  • City-specific exclusivity

Prominent placement across a city’s main hub page.

  • Multiple placements on the city hub
  • Designed for local authority positioning
  • Does not include category exclusivity

Total City / State Buyout

$14,500 / month

Submit Inquiry

Complete sponsorship control of a single city (and associated state landing pages when applicable).

  • All city hub placements
  • All category page placements
  • City-specific hero placement (when applicable)
  • One advertiser per city

Entire Website Buyout

$75,000 / month

Submit Inquiry

Platform-wide exclusivity designed for a single national advertiser.

  • Home page hero placement
  • All city pages (live and future)
  • All category pages and guides
  • Single advertiser across the entire platform

The Entire Website Buyout includes all current inventory and automatically extends to new cities as they launch, without renegotiation.

What slots look like (visual)

These diagrams show how sponsorship placements appear on city hubs, category pages, and guides. Advertising is always labeled and separated from editorial content.

Editorial Guide Presence — shared visibility inside guides

Where you appear: guide and FAQ pages (shared, non-exclusive).

  • Guide advertising stacks (when available)
  • FAQ advertising stack (when available)
Category Ownership — exclusive category placement in a city

Where you appear: category pages for one service line in one city.

  • Category page: top, mid, bottom
  • One sponsor per category (city-specific)
Total City / State Buyout — full city (and state, when applicable)

Where you appear: all sponsored placements for a city, plus associated state landing pages when applicable.

  • City hub: top, mid, bottom
  • All category pages in the city: top, mid, bottom
  • City hero placement (when applicable)
Entire Website Buyout — platform-wide exclusivity

Where you appear: every placement site-wide, including future cities.

  • Home hero
  • All cities (current and future)
  • All categories and guides
%%AD:for_providers_bottom%%

Advertising inquiry

Ask about availability, request an update, or propose a partnership. You may also contact us directly at info@spryvc.com.

Submitting this will open your email client with details pre-filled. No information is stored on this website.
